resources.string: Welcome to Fotobot! This application will help you to control remote places thrue thousands of miles. You will receive photo-reports periodically after predefined interval of time. You will be able to change Fotobot\'s settings remotely via SMS. Detailed instructions can be found there: http://v-and-f.ru/fotobot

Version 2.4.4:
Internal and External types of storage have been removed. From now we have to set absolute path to folder for images storing. Just use your favorite File Browser to obtain this path.
Camera Name will be added to emails title, it will help to sort out mails in Inbox
Password for administration via SMS (if password is wrong than rest part of SMS will be ignored)
Select network mode: on (photos will be saved on phone and sent to email), off (photos will be saved on phone without of mail sending )
Absolute path to folder with photos
Check this box to delete foto after sending to email
Define the length of the text output in Main Window
Number of lines in log file
Need time to activate Wi-Fi, please wait
Connection channel is Wi-Fi and Mobile Data
No connection via Wi-Fi, is switching to Mobile Data
Fotobot is connecting to Internet, attempt
Fotobot is starting to make photo
Request for stop has been sent. Wait for stopping message on the screen, after that Fotobot will be stopped correctly.

User Manual

This is simple Android application designed for taking and sending of pictures to user e-mail. Simple scheduler is used for this. Detailed instructions can be found there: http://v-and-f.ru/fotobot
Welcome to Fotobot! Please review documentation if you first time here (press Help button at the bottom of the screen).

Time delay between frames, do not use small values cause it can leeds to inactive application. Values less then 30sec can produce problems on old phones (Android 2). Make some experiments to find out suitable value. Default is 30.
Time delay between processes. Very important for old devices. Default values are 5-15sec.
Pause before making of another attempt to connect to Internet
Log wil help to debug some situations with Fotobot
Need to keep Fotobot in memory (to avoid kicking by Android)
Select Internet connection (Mobile Data, Wi-Fi or Both)

Select method for Internet connection. Method 1 - connection will be opened before Fotobot starts. "Method 2 - connection will be opened before taking of picture and closed after sending picture to email.
Fotobot uses this account for mail sending.
SMTP server address (f.e. smtp.google.com for Google Mail)
SMTP server port number, usually equal 465
Time (sec) required to bring up network interface (Wi-Fi or Mobile Data)
Select method for image processing. Hardware - RAW from sensor and convert it to JPEG. Software - JPEG from camera.
Foto scale: 1-full size image, 1/2-image will be reduced 2 times along both directions, 1/4-4 times
Foto resolution (width x height) in pixels
Check this and press APPLY button, after that text in main window will be cleaned
Check this and press APPLY button, after that logger will be reseted
Check this and press APPLY button, after that log will be cleaned
Time for sending of previous email (sec)
